name: Circle Relax: Daily Art Puzzle
description:
Circle Relax block puzzle delivers a simple and addicting classic slider puzzle. Tap or slide the tiles to solve the puzzle. Play using the beautiful in-built tropical island picture, or create unlimited puzzles. How quickly can you complete the game?

Circle Relax features:
• Game timer and moves counter stats to measure skill progress.
• Free puzzle gallery updated daily!
• More than 1000 beautiful high-definition puzzles!
• New puzzle packs with unique works by painters!
• In-game pause function.
• Many difficulty levels.
• Work on more than one puzzle at a time and see your progress!
• Preview the finished art picture to help you solve it!
• Tiles slide smoothly and quickly into place.
• Rotation mode for real jigsaw puzzle pros! Move pieces in groups!
• Great music collection: choose the right musical accompaniment to suit your mood!
• Simple controls make it easy to solve jigsaw puzzles!

And there are more features to discover! You can easily create a unique personalized puzzle! Plus you can choose the melody you like best from the in-game musiс collection to accompany your relaxing, stress-relieving art picture sessions!
In Circle Relax you can travel all around the globe, see majestic landscapes, experience the seasons of the year and the wonders of the world, all from the peace and quiet of your own home.
We've created this app for you to make it possible to play your favorite game anywhere and anytime. It fully simulates the real free jigsaw puzzles and, at the same time, the app uses all its advantages to make the playing of your favorite game as convenient as it has ever been possible.
